title: Bimser Synergy

container.value:
Yenikoy Merkez Mahallesi Vatan Caddesi KOU Teknopark No: 83/A-6 41275 Başiskele/KOCAELİ – TÜRKİYE

creator: Bimser Çözüm
descriptionHtml:
In today’s conditions, where the importance of agility is increasing day by day, move your business processes to digital and give your approvals with Bimser Synergy CSP Workflow Management System, speed up your processes. Create or edit your corporate memory. Transfer the information, documents and records created by your institution to the digital platform with Bimser Synergy CSP Document Management System. Securely store, edit, approve and access anytime on any device.

Start using tomorrow's technologies today. Bimser Synergy CSP enables you to manage your today with the infrastructure of the future. It offers strong, safe and flexible solution models in continuous development. It allows you to capture the rapid transformation in digital.
Bimser Synergy CSP (Content Services Platform) is an integrated and cloud-based content services platform that supports digital transformation and covers Document Management, Workflow Management, and back-office processes. Easily draw your workflows, define your forms and manage your processes effectively and efficiently with Bimser Synergy CSP, designed for all devices and operating systems. You can create all of this processes without using code. Fast, easy and smart!
Access all your apps from anywhere and on all your devices. Moreover, with the powerful and easy IDE, you can create native mobile apps in minutes.
Manage all your corporate processes and your documents, which are the inputs and outputs of your processes, effectively and efficiently on the digital platform with Bimser Synergy CSP.

• Create your corporate memory, create your folders, upload, authorize and index your documents with Bimser Synergy CSP Workflow and Document Management System.
• More importantly, drag and drop design your corporate processes and circulate your forms for approval.
• Also turn this data into visual reports.
• With Bimser Synergy CSP, get rid of your no added value works, increase your profitability, reduce your costs and increase productivity by using your time effectively.
• Improve your performance by prioritizing value and use your resources effectively. Integrate your content into your processes in digital transformation!
descriptionShort: Bimser Synergy CSP (Content Services Platform) Mobile

Start using tomorrow's technologies today. Bimser Synergy CSP enables you to manage your today with the infrastructure of the future. It offers strong, safe and flexible solution models in continuous development. It allows you to capture the rapid transformation in digital.
Bimser Synergy CSP (Content Services Platform) is an integrated and cloud-based content services platform that supports digital transformation and covers Document Management, Workflow Management, and back-office processes.
